title: MA61013: Foundations Of Computer Science - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidGraph theory and algorithms, Search techniques, Dynamic programming, Backtracking. Propositional logic, Predicate logic, Automated theorem proving, Functional and logic programming, Proof of program correctness. Finite state automata, Regular expression, Grammar, Turing machine, Recursively enumerable sets, Computibility. Relational data base, SQL, Relational calculus, Functional dependency, Normal forms, File organization, Index sequential file. Computer networks: Interconnection schemes, Digital signal encoding, Addressing schemes, Transmission media. Operating systems: Process scheduling, Disk scheduling, Deadlocks, File structure on UNIX, inode, Concurrent programming, Critical section problem. Artificial Intelligence: Natural language processing , Knowledge representation, expert systems, Default reasoning, Production systems. Compiler design: Syntax directed translation, Lexical analysis, Code generation, DAG representation, Loop optimization, Data flow analysis.
